response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its significance and the unique benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a special price of $750,000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we are confident that the product's quality and potential impact will justify every penny spent. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
